meanings.definition: A particular form of expression or phrase.
meanings.sent1: Her locution was filled with colorful phrases and unique expressions.
meanings.sent2: The poet's locution in his writing was elegant and captivating.
meanings.sent3: His locution was so quirky that it made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The locution of the old wise man was like a treasure trove of wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The locution of the storyteller painted vivid pictures in the listeners' minds.

meanings.definition: The style or manner of speaking.
meanings.sent1: The professor's locution was clear and easy to follow.
meanings.sent2: She admired the news anchor's professional locution on television.
meanings.sent3: His locution was so formal that it made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: The politician's locution was like a powerful weapon in debates.
meanings.sent5: The locution of the actor on stage was so convincing that the audience was moved.
